General.Name: Humax Holdings Co. Ltd
General.Description: Humax Holdings Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells broadcasting and wireless communication devices and automotive antennas in South Korea and internationally. It provides set-top boxes, broadband gateways, video gateways, and car infotainment solutions, as well as information and communication consulting services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
